item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 30 Aug 2022
item.description:
1. What's your development workflow?
  2. Mirage retreat October 3rd - 9th
  3. Experience report: making a JavaScript library from an OCaml library with js_of_ocaml
  4. Will I ever understand Format? or How to print a list vertically with indentation
  5. GNU Guile 1.0.0 - Bindings to GNU Guile for OCaml
  6. Update on Eio (effects-based direct-style IO for OCaml 5)
  7. OCaml at First Glance
  8. GADTs for typed option getter/setter
  9. shuttle v0.3.1 released
  10. coinductive data types
